General.Name: PT MNC Energy Investments Tbk
General.Description: PT MNC Energy Investments Tbk, an investment and holding company, engages in the trading and investment in energy sector. The company is involved in the exploration and development of coal mining properties; aircraft charter and maintenance; and port activities. It serves the onshore and offshore oil and gas, and mining companies. The company was formerly known as PT Indonesia Transport & Infrastructure Tbk and changed its name to PT MNC Energy Investments Tbk in February 2022. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Jakarta, Indonesia.
